job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>&nbsp;<strong>Data Scientist</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Our Client is building the next generation of Big Data analytical platforms, integrating multiple, large-scale data sources and a set of data products to leverage Big Data platforms.</p><p>We are looking for a Data Scientist who is highly self-driven and able to interact with a world-class research and development organization.</p><p>This role implies hands-on use of cutting-edge technologies in the space of Big Data analytics, machine learning and data visualization.</p><p>It is important that our candidate has a strong background in statistics, acute business sense and practical programming skills. We expect the candidate to be a highly motivated and result-focused individual.</p><p>A successful candidate for this role will have a wide interdisciplinary professional&nbsp;skill-set. The candidate will be proficient in turning data discoveries into profitable products and measurable improvements for our business partners, in short development cycles.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>The job implies:</strong></p><ul><li>Researching Client and industry Big Data sources to identify potential applications and patterns</li><li>Researching and evaluating the feasibility of Big Data applications</li><li>Analyzing&nbsp;large amounts of data from different domains&nbsp;</li><li>Involvement in a process of designing and developing data-driven products</li><li>Working closely with an array of various teams and organizations in the organization to collect requirements and design solution architectures</li><li>Implementing of machine learning software systems and tools using industry-standard infrastructures and libraries, and up-to-date software development practices.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Required Skills:</strong></p><ul><li>At least 2 years’ experience in Data Science/Big Data Analytics/Data Engineering</li><li>Strong expertise in mathematical Statistics, advanced statistical modeling, machine learning systems, computer programming and automated reasoning algorithmic solutions&nbsp;</li><li>Experience in Big Data ETL processes, data visualization, data exploring algorithms</li><li>Experience in data modeling and data management, analytical tools, languages and libraries (languages (MATLAB/Octave, Excel, R, Python + Scikit-learn + pandas, WEKA, MLLib etc.).&nbsp;</li><li>Excellent interpersonal and communication&nbsp;skills, high teamwork ability</li><li>Bachelor's in Mathematics/Statistics/Computer Science</li><li>Strong Acquaintance with Big Data architectures and technology including OpenStack, Hadoop, Pig, Hive, H-base, Spark, Elasticsearch,&nbsp;or other big data platforms</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Additional:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Relevant Exact/Natural Sciences Master’s degree or above--an advantage</li><li>Experience in real-time analytics, NoSQL data stores--an advantage</li><li>Experience in the telecommunications industry--an advantage</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>
